body.name: Mini Projector, 2023 Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 9500 Lux Movie Projector, 1080P Full HD Supported Outdoor Projector, Portable Projector Compatible with Android/iOS/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
features: 【The Projector You’ve Been Dreaming of】 One instead of a TV for bed room, kids room, college room, backyard or traveling and camping! One with a cute size which is lightweight and easy to carry! One with excellent picture quality which has high brightness&resolution! One is an outdoor projector for happy movie nights! THE MOST IMPORTANT, one has the above points but with a low price!

【Small But Mighty】 This portable projector is a Handy Little one with 2023 Latest Technology. Try this one instead of the TV because of its small item size with big projection size! It is easy to carry around to watch movies or play video games. 9500 Lux, 1080p supported with 720P native resolution. This movie projector comes with great picture quality.

【Convenient 5G WiFi Connection】Projector with WiFi, uses the latest 5G WiFi technology, you can mirror your iOS and Android devices with the 5G WiFi (also support 2.4 WiFi), the connection will be smoother and more stable. Compared to other WiFi projectors, we have simplified the WiFi connection steps, making it more user friendly.

【Projector with Bluetooth, Better Sound & Lower Noise】It is a Bluetooth Projector. You can wirelessly pair with your bluetooth speaker, headphones, soundbar anytime and anywhere. It is a mini projector with WiFi and bluetooth, you can hook up external speakers, the sound is greatly enhanced and sounded theater quality. Also, the built-in stereo surround speaker is good enough.

【Best Gift Choice】 It has amazing quality and price! Best Gift Choice for Birthday, Festival to your children, friends, family members. For children to watch cartoons and videos with large projection size to protect their eyes. Also for camping or small team meetings! We provide a 3-YEAR After sales service promise, contact us anytime by email.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,555 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HANDY LITTLE PROJECTOR WITH 5G WIFI AND BLUETOOTH

HOW SMALL IS IT? It is 2.69 inch, a mini pocket projector. It is small, compact and lightweight. Which means it is not only portable easy to move around, but also can fit into a tiny dorm room with ease, an average sized conference room or kids room for movie nights, holiday decoration.

HOW MIGHTLY IS IT? DON'T LET THE SIZE FOOL YOU! It is a bluetooth projector, you can connect a speaker or headphone wirelessly to get an excellent sound experience. (Bluetooth doesn't support connecting with smartphones to mirror, Only supports connecting with Audio devices)

It is a projector with WiFi. You can mirror your iOS and Android devices with the 5G WiFi easily. With 5G WiFi latest function, the projector will offer you a faster wireless speed, wider range, and smoother transmission. Say goodbye to the traditional connection hassle.

The Brightness and Resolution is better than the 4.0 inch projectors, it does produce a clear and bright picture. It also supports large spaces such as living room, backyard with great picture quality, projector for outdoor movie nights, a movie projector for outdoor use.
Previous page Next page 1 Enjoy it with TV Stick 2 Projection Size 3 Multi-Use

How to play Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu and other copyright protected apps? Option 1: Connect with a TV stick to this projector. Option 2: Connect a laptop via HDMI cable to this projector. Option 3: Connect with an adapter. For ios devices, A-pple L-ight-ning to Digital AV Adapter. For Android devices, Google Ch-rome-cast. There is no sound when connecting to the TV stick? Turn off the Dolby audio on your TV sticlk audio setting. The WiFi can't work well? Make sure that the projector and your phone are connected to the same WiFi router, and keep the projector on the mirror page before mirroring. Or restart the projector and your phone. Or contact the seller support for more help. How to make the picture clearly? When the projector is moving with the distance changes, the picture will be blurred, just rotating the focus and keystone can make the picture clear. Recommended to use it in a dark environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price and convenient to tote around
reviews.reviewText: This projector has a lot going for it. The picture quality is good, especially when you're in a darker room. It's been a fantastic addition to our cozy movie nights outside and I am looking forward to using it this fall. The clarity and vibrancy of the images really shine when the lights are dimmed. I've noticed that in well-lit environments, the image quality can be a bit compromised, so I recommend using it in a darker setting for the best results. The sound quality of this projector is another highlight. The audio is clear and does not garble dialogue. In terms of its design and build, the projector looks sleek and modern. It's compact, making it easy to carry around or set up wherever needed. The controls are pretty user friendly and easy to manage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, quiet, bright. I have been beyond impressed.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product! It is compact, light, small enough to store easily in cramped spaces, and quiet for it's size. I have been using it for a couple of months now and am impressed with the features it contains. It pairs to my Bluetooth speaker while still being able to allow me to screen share whatever I have from my phone to it. I have viewed photos and movies from flash drives plugged into it and have found that absolutely awesome! It also didn't seem to strain my budget being a college aged kid with little income.I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great mini projector with amazing picture
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love how easy it was to set-up. There was no problem connecting to my WiFi. The picture quality is amazing. I bought it to play my video games on basically the colors are bright bold and so really shows the details of my PS5. The sound quality is okay but I ordered a sound bar also. Sounds are crisp and clear. It's so easy to move from my living room to the bedroom or outside when me and my guys wanna game outside. I just love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Quality for a budget-friendly projector!
reviews.reviewText: I was most happy with the mini size as advertised. It has a decent enough picture in a lighted room. But you'll for sure get the best picture in a dim lit room. It has the all-important HDMI port to run your favorite gaming or streaming device. There's also a VGA port for any computer or other media device without the HDMI output available. I also like the ability to use the Bluetooth connection or aux to connect to an external device, though the sound is surprisingly good for its size. I'm so pleased by this one, I'm thinking about getting one or two more and gifting for the holidays!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smaller portable size, great picture once focused, has attachment hole for a tripod or stand. The orientation can be changed if on stand or mounted from the ceiling. Worked great with my Amazon Fire Stick (bought separately). Feels like I’m at a movie theater in my own home. The sound is also great just from the projector and can be connected by Bluetooth to a speaker as well. Works best in a dark room as with any other projector. Very cost effective related to some other projectors I was comparison shopping against. Requires WiFi but was fairly simple to figure out the set up. I’ve been recommending this one to many people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall good projector
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The projector is pretty good. Picture quality is better than I expected it to be. Sound is decent. Some shows/movies can be fairly quiet. The reason for three stars is that they claimed to be able to cast from phone or other devices but that feature does not work. I contacted using the email they provide and received no response. I ended up having to take my chromecast and fire stick from my other TVs and plugging it in whenever I want to use this which is pretty inconvenient. I am debating returning the product since I paid primarily for the feature that does not work and I shouldn’t have to purchase other products for this to work. Without the chromecast or fire stick plugged into it, the projector is useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: So, DJI sent this to me and asked that I review this product.I will start off by saying that for this price range this projector is awesome! Nice sharp picture, easy to set up and works well. This would be a great projector for family gatherings in the back yard.This past Halloween I used the projector to show some themed .MP4s on the screens of my balcony using a thumb drive and it worked just fine.So far, one of the issues I've had is that when streaming things from my iPhone 12 Max Pro, like from HBO Max or Paramount+, the video has an issue of not playing in landscape mode. It does work in landscape when I'm streaming YouTube from my phone.The speaker is adequate, however I would connect a Bluetooth speaker for a better dynamic range.I also think, and this is completely subjective, that it could be a bit brighter.I'll continue to use the projector and I'll update this review as needed, but over all, this is a great projector for the price. I works well, it's an easy set up - for me anyway.If you need a simple projector for everyday use, then I can recommend this one.

Está muy práctico para lo que se usa y cuesta, lo he usado solo para ver dos o tres películas para mis hijos,, el volumen es bueno pero aún así usamos una bocina, no se ve así como que en súper HD pero se ve bien a una distancia de dos metros más o menos ,, vale la pena para uso doméstico por el precio, tamaño y calidad
I like this product. Value for money. Good to use for special occasions or home use. You need a good speaker to compliment this product.
